parameters.name: useReitan
parameters.description: Whether to use Reitan's points in the mix.

parameters.name: useShortPath
parameters.description: Whether to shorten the path so points tend to be adjacent.

parameters.name: shorteningtrials
parameters.description: Number of attempts to find the shortest path.  Originally, this was always 1

parameters.name: numtrials
parameters.description: total number of trials per condition (A and B). If usereitan == 1, 2 of them will be the Reitan configurations

parameters.name: useLetters
parameters.description: Should you also include a letter set?  Note that this adds a third time through the same problem; this time reflected top-bottom.

parameters.name: doPractice
parameters.description: Do a short practice round between each round, using 4 items, to let them see how to do it.

parameters.name: TargclickSize
parameters.description: Size of click zone; may be smaller or larger

parameters.name: pointtolerance
parameters.description: minimum number of pixels of separation between targets (a soft constraint that will be violated if proper configuration cannot be found)

parameters.name: NumTargs
parameters.description: Number of targets to use in the non-reitan problems

parameters.name: DrawLines
parameters.description: Whether to draw lines between targets

parameters.name: fieldwidth
parameters.description: width of target field in pixels

parameters.name: fieldheight
parameters.description: height of target field in pixels
